ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:48:06 [Issue ID 4000-37631] urn:comicvine:4000-37631 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 06:39:25. [Issue ID 53448]
ComicInfo.Summary: Backlash begins to train Jackson's brother in the use of his new powers. A Skywatch shuttlecraft is attacked by Daemonites and the ship returns to base with a possessed crew. Stormwatch catches up with the intruders but not before the Daemonites possess LaSalle and the Warguard.
ComicInfo.Writer: Brandon Choi,Jim Lee,Sean Ruffner,Paige Apfelbaum,Paige Apfelbaum,Jim Lee,Sean Ruffner
